text: Jennifer Howell is a Canadian senior film and television executive and producer. She is the voice of Bebe Stevens on the animated television series South Park and was the show's supervising director from 1997 to 2006. Howell won the Emmy Award for South Park in 2004 and the Peabody Award in 2005. ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:Canadian television producers Category:Canadian movie producers
title: Jennifer Howell
